meta.title: An Overview of the Shuksep Kagyü Tradition

nodes.body: The Shuksep Kagyü order was named after Shuksep (shug gseb) Monastery in Nyipu (snyi phu),  Central Tibet, which was founded by Gyer Gomchenpo Tsültrim Senggé (gyer sgom chen po tshul khrims seng ge) in 1181.
nodes.title: An Overview of the Shuksep Kagyü Tradition
